definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to rise (i.e. number increases)/a price rise/to raise
Zhang Yang (1967-), PRC film director and screenwriter
to display ostentatiously/to bring out into the open/to make public/to spread around/flamboyant/brash
Zhang Yang (1967-), PRC film director and screenwriter
to display ostentatiously/to bring out into the open/to make public/to spread around/flamboyant/brash
to develop/to make full use of
Yangzhou prefecture level city in Jiangsu
to praise/to approve of/to show approval
to proclaim/to make public or well known

sentences.english: Uncertainty may exist in dealing with the mechanism of local uplift anomaly on dam foundation.
sentences.chinese: 坝基局部扬压力异常机理的分析中通常存在不确定性。

sentences.english: Gheryan town liberated green flags flying in all top destinations.
sentences.chinese: 盖尔扬解放，高处绿旗飞扬。

sentences.english: Lambs frisk and play, the shepherds pipe all day.
sentences.chinese: 羊羔欢跃喜洋洋，牧童整天笛声扬。

sentences.english: And as they cried out, and cast off their clothes, and threw dust into the air
sentences.chinese: 众人喧囔，摔掉衣裳，把尘土向空中扬起来。

sentences.english: Aborigines kick up dust in a dance at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 土著居民日落时的舞蹈能把灰尘扬起来。

sentences.english: Uncle Homayoun held her by the shoulders in an attempt to comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 荷马扬叔叔搂着她的肩试图宽慰她。

sentences.english: I wrote an long article yesterday, but I didn't save it.
sentences.chinese: 扬洒洒写了一篇文章，结果没存盘。

sentences.english: She urged Kabul to stop making such claims.
sentences.chinese: 扬尤亚敦促喀布尔不要再提出这种指称。

sentences.english: Since the beginning of this year, the organization in Abyan province frequent attacks.
sentences.chinese: 自今年年初以来，该组织在阿比扬省内频繁发动袭击。

sentences.english: Now, Devarajan fears Africa will also lag behind in recovery.
sentences.chinese: 德瓦拉扬担心，非洲的复苏进程也将滞后。

sentences.english: And see warm-blooded son, Yang I the great power.
sentences.chinese: 且看热血男儿，扬我中华神威。

sentences.english: The orcs surrounding the portal are defeated by Turalyon on the Hellfire Penninsula.
sentences.chinese: 守卫黑暗之门的兽人被图拉扬在地狱火半岛击败。

sentences.english: Uncle Homayoun and his manservant occupied the entire upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 荷马扬叔叔和他的男仆占着整个顶楼。

sentences.english: Harry only raises an eyebrow, still unconvinced.
sentences.chinese: 只是扬了扬眉，还是不相信。

sentences.english: Is your character still close to them or have you grown apart?
sentences.chinese: 你的角色仍然跟他们很亲密，还是已经分道扬鏣？

definition: pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
